verbose_text: 18 F-Fluorodeoxyglucose (FDG) imaging in positron emission tomography (PET) CT scanning is an advanced imaging technique that is exquisitely sensitive for detecting macrophage activity, and thus enables highly precise measurements of inflammation in atherosclerotic plaques both in large and medium sized arteries.
evidence: PET) CT scanning is an advanced imaging technique that is exquisitely sensitive for detecting macrophage activity, and thus enables highly precise measurements of inflammation
